trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The vacillating Loporrit is in need of help.
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Loporrit tailor.
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_TODO_01<tab>/pose for the Loporrit tailor.
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_TODO_02<tab>Assume your /battlestance for the Loporrit tailor.
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the vacillating Loporrit.
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSA04246_000_000<tab>Oh! It's you! Uh... If it's not too much trouble, I could really use your help!
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSA04246_000_001<tab>We've been making clothes for your people, but after speaking with Livingway, I realized we've made a grave mistake!
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSA04246_000_002<tab>Considerable alterations must be made to our plans, and I was hoping you might join me to speak with the Loporrit in charge of garment adjustments.
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSA04246_000_003<tab>Thank you! They're not going to be happy about this...
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSA04246_000_004<tab>I'm telling you, we're doing it all wrong! We have to fix these clothes before it's too late!
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSB04246_000_010<tab>How are we supposed to resize everything when we don't even know what to base the alterations on?
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSB04246_000_011<tab>Oh! You must be the model, then. I see... You really are like a baby carrot.
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSA04246_000_012<tab>Perhaps an explanation is in order... You see, we'd like you to help us redefine the style of the clothing we create.

TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSA04246_000_013<tab>We believe comfort and familiarity are key to accommodating the people of Etheirys...which is why we thought masks and all-purpose robes would suffice.

TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSA04246_100_013<tab>When Livingway claimed the fashion trends of Etheirys are far removed from what we were anticipating, I was incredulous, but meeting you made everything painfully clear!
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSB04246_000_014<tab>Indeed. I see now that our plans won't do. Your garments are so vibrant and...unique.
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSB04246_000_015<tab>We still need to decide what adjustments to make, so would you please stay a while?

TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSB04246_000_016<tab>Thank you. Now, be a dear and strike a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>pose<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> for me, will you? I want to get an idea of how the fabric moves with you.
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSA04246_000_016<tab>If you could <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>pose<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> for me, that would be a great help.

TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSB04246_000_020<tab>No need to be shy. There's no one watching but the two of us. Go ahead and give us a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>pose<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>The Loporrit tailor watches you intently. Strike a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>pose<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to show off your garb.
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSB04246_000_022<tab>Yes, just like that! Hmm... I see. May I ask why you chose to wear this outfit?
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_A1_000_001<tab>I like how it looks.
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_A1_000_002<tab>It's practical.
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_A1_000_003<tab>Not sure <var 1A 02 /var>what<var 1A 01 /var> I was thinking, to be honest.
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSB04246_000_023<tab>So people find designs like this aesthetically pleasing? I'll have to bear that in mind when I redesign our concepts...
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSB04246_000_024<tab>Ah, so it's not only form that appeals to you, but function as well! A practical choice, I suppose, if you're to take to the battlefield...
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSB04246_000_025<tab>What, did you choose it with your eyes closed? Ugh... Well, I suppose it just goes to show how very routine clothing is to you.

TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSB04246_000_027<tab>Might I see your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>battle stance<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> next? If the people of Etheirys have need to fight, I'd like to be certain their clothes strike fear in the hearts of their enemies.
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSA04246_000_028<tab>I'm fairly sure that if I were to wander onto a battlefield, I'd be turned into a pelt in no time...

TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSB04246_000_030<tab>Would you show me your most valiant <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>battle stance<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>? Your clothes must be stylish, but they must also strike fear into the hearts of your enemies! ...People enjoy that, yes?
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>The Loporrit tailor watches you intently. Assume a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>battle stance<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to show off your garb.
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSB04246_000_032<tab>Yes... I believe I have a solid grasp of what our designs were lacking before.
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSA04246_000_033<tab>Truly, I never realized that one's choice of attire could make such an impression!
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSB04246_000_034<tab>And that ensemble quite befits your personality, I must say.
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSB04246_000_035<tab>...Which means we can't just throw the same garb on everyone. What is that saying you have? Ah, yes─“variety is the spice of life”!
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSB04246_000_036<tab>You have given me so many new ideas, I can hardly wait to get started! In fact, I cannot wait at all!
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSA04246_000_037<tab>Er... Right, then. Would you care to follow me back to my station?
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSA04246_000_040<tab>I do believe that we have a much better idea of what we should be making now, and the necessary alterations should prove little trouble.
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSA04246_000_041<tab>Just you wait─someday soon, the people of Etheirys will be clamoring for the latest fashions from Bestways Burrow!
TEXT_AKTKZE007_04246_LOPORRITSA04246_000_042<tab>...Assuming I get back to work, that is. Thank you for your help!
